message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a really high-quality item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within a lower budget. Would you consider selling it to me for $120?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're looking to stay within a lower budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to counter with $125 for the product. I hope this meets within your comfort zone.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence! I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I can sell the product to you for $130. It's a fair price, and I think you'll be happy with the deal.
